effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

short_effect.sun_moon: Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

flavor_text.sun_moon: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
